Tree | blank1_info_sec1 = camellia sinensis | blank2_name_sec1 = - Flower | blank2_info_sec1 = hydrangea | blank3_name_sec1 = | blank3_info_sec1 = | blank4_name_sec1 = | blank4_info_sec1 = | blank5_name_sec1 = | blank5_info_sec1 = | blank6_name_sec1 = | blank6_info_sec1 = | blank7_name_sec1 = | blank7_info_sec1 = | blank_name_sec2 = Phone number | blank_info_sec2 = 548-23-0001 | blank1_name_sec2 = Address | blank1_info_sec2 = 447 Shizunami, Makinohara-shi, Shizuoka-ken 421-0495 | website = | footnotes = }} Makinohara is a city in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan. It is a coastal city on the island of Honshū next to Suruga Bay. Nearby cities are: Omaezaki, Kikugawa, Shimada, and Yoshida. ==Sister cities== * - Kelso, Washington, USA * - Matsukawa, Nagano (Shimoina), Japan * - Sannohe, Aomori, Japan * - Hitoyoshi, Kumamoto, Japan ==People from Makinohara== * Takuma Edamura - professional soccer player * Mika Motosugi - actress, member of C.C.Girls J-Pop group * Umetaro Suzuki - scientist ==Other websites== Category:Cities in Shizuoka Prefecture
title: Makinohara
